title: "Hanger" text to 35350 to donate to local food banks?
subtitle: Send the word "HUNGER" to 35350. The Sam Club will no longer donate the equivalent of 12 meals to a local food bank that no longer works; you must send "MALS" to that number.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Send the word "HUNGER" to 35350 will make the Sam Club donate the equivalent of 12 cash meals to a local food bank.
